channel.title: 2024 on courtside nyc
channel.description: Recent content in 2024 on courtside nyc

item.title: coqodaq
item.description: thoughts the big sink with like 15 soaps to wash your hands right at the entrance was simply delightful service 10/10 no notes coat check menu highlights chicken bucket duh caviar not necessary imo

item.title: old john's luncheonette
item.description: thoughts pies looked bomb typical diner

item.title: clinton st. baking company
item.description: thoughts put our name in at 10:30 on saturday, 2 hour wait, sat down 12:45 worth the wait menu highlights chicken & waffles milkshake

item.title: nan xiang xiao long bao
item.description: locations east village midtown williamsburg flushing - the og thoughts easy, delicious menu highlights soup dumplings

item.title: mission ceviche
item.description: locations upper east side union square thoughts “8/10, too nice inside” - travis clarke (the ceviche king himself) menu highlights red snapper

item.title: salma
item.description: thoughts byob menu highlights v good hummus

item.title: l'industrie
item.description: locations williamsburg west village thoughts chaotic in there, get in, get out whole pizzas to-go, elite move menu highlights soft serve is gas

item.title: ma • dé
item.description: thoughts seasonal veggies & fish

item.title: francie
item.description: thoughts worth it menu highlights duck pasta

item.title: cozy royale
item.description: thoughts if i was a local i’d come here a lot menu highlights burger

item.title: monkey bar
item.description: thoughts cecchi’s older sister menu highlights burger

item.title: this bowl
item.description: thoughts line moves quick

item.title: carnitas ramirez
item.description: thoughts goat

item.title: llama inn
item.description: thoughts easy to get a res menu highlights snow peas lamb sausage

item.title: keens steakhouse
item.description: thoughts understand the hype

item.title: lucia alimentari
item.description: thoughts bop easy repeat menu highlights little gem caesar vodka pizza

item.title: kanyakumari
item.description: thoughts fantastic menu highlights from mumbai - samrat vada pav

item.title: taverna kyclades
item.description: thoughts decor is copy paste from greece

item.title: tucci
item.description: thoughts cool basement bar menu highlights crispy artichokes chicken parm

item.title: 19 cleveland
item.description: thoughts not bad

item.title: the taco stand
item.description: thoughts don’t let anyone talk you out of getting guac (@ miguel) menu highlights al pastor

item.title: penny
item.description: thoughts delightful menu highlights wine list goes crazy

item.title: bangkok supper club
item.description: thoughts open kitchen unique cocktails menu highlights hokkaido scallop ceviche pork jowl bangkok gai yang

item.title: panzón
item.description: thoughts back garden makes a mean margartia

item.title: cafe camellia
item.description: thoughts heavy on the fried food, but no regrets menu highlights fried green tomatoes crab claws red beans & rice

item.title: dudley's
item.description: thoughts easy week day brunch/lunch

item.title: altro paradiso
item.description: thoughts underrated, top 5 outdoor seating on a nice day, woww menu highlights chicken milanese pesto & ramp pasta (likely seasonal) fennel & arancini were also bops

item.title: elnico
item.description: thoughts pleasantly colorful, but the neon bathroom lights are an actual hellscape

item.title: café chelsea
item.description: thoughts tables better suited for 2 or 4 post dinner lobby bar menu highlights spaghetti au citron meyer (lemon pasta) panisse (chickpea fries)

item.title: conwell coffee hall
item.description: thoughts converted old bank into coffee shop & full bar (tragically closes @ 9pm) order drinks from the “bank teller” also serves food

item.title: tartine
item.description: thoughts sit outside + bottle of wine + people watch andy cohen sighting menu highlights tuna tartare

item.title: the commodore ii
item.description: thoughts if i lived closer would be a local haunt menu highlights comfort food is king (entire menu is fire)

item.title: paros
item.description: thoughts lot of suits menu highlights dessert

item.title: ayat
item.description: new york locations east village bayridge industry city staten island thoughts underrated menu highlights maklouba mansaf

item.title: s&p lunch
item.description: thoughts worth wait in line 1-2 people perfect #, might wait longer for 3-4 menu highlights tuna melt pastrami

item.title: tokyo record bar
item.description: thoughts food is nothng fancy, but fun dining experience i chose “fantasy” by mariah carey :) bar upstairs is p cool

item.title: cervo's
item.description: thoughts everything is good, not a single miss

item.title: noble rot
item.description: locations lamb’s conduit soho mayfair thoughts amazing wine list cozy menu highlights gnocchi

item.title: lord's
item.description: thoughts sit at bar not for picky eaters menu highlights tiny martini pig’s head duck pie oysters

item.title: cecchi's
item.description: thoughts when dinner is the night out want to take anyone and everyone i know here menu highlights pork chop cheesecake

item.title: apollo bagels
item.description: thoughts sourdough (not new york style) avoid weekends, line is too long (hour+) menu highlights small, fixed menu honestly plain bagel with butter and jam goes crazy

item.title: bad hombre
item.description: thoughts took a long time to make our drinks, but brought us a free dessert menu highlights aguachille skirt steak

item.title: b&h dairy
item.description: thoughts different deal every day of the week menu highlights tuna melt

item.title: hooked
item.description: thoughts very fun concept, they bring out the available fish and you get to choose. they course it out for you (poke, sashimi, cooked, etc) all with the same fish

item.title: hen house nyc
item.description: thoughts lebanese shawarma menu highlights piri piri fried chicken sando if “fully loaded” is presented as an option, do it

item.title: sappe
item.description: thoughts they have semi private room for party of 8, super cozy staff were so kind and patient with my large group pre-fixe $80 for more than 8 people menu highlights online cocktail menu krapow moo grob ribs (rack)

item.title: pinch chinese
item.description: thoughts highlight for me was actually the wine list ? brought out sparkler for my friend’s birthday menu highlights spicy wontons brussel sprouts

item.title: tatiana by kwame onwuachi
item.description: thoughts walk into lincoln center, it’s on the right menu highlights everything we ate was insanely good my two favorites were the egusi dumplings & the short rib pastrami suya

item.title: málà project
item.description: 4 locations thoughts yummy menu highlights dry pot (spicy) eggplant app is fire

item.title: the nines
item.description: thoughts acme downstairs, opens 10:30 max table holds 6 people

item.title: veeray da dhaba
item.description: menu highlights veeray di gobhi

item.title: golden diner
item.description: thoughts walk-in only on weekends (waits can range anywhere from 1-4 hours lol) go during week when they accept resys menu highlights pancake tuna melt

item.title: revelie luncheonette
item.description: thoughts would go just to hang with eric again walk-in only menu highlights green chile cheeseburger chopped cheese egg sandwich

item.title: domo domo
item.description: thoughts when the sushi craving hits and needs to be resolved asap but there’s cheaper + better omakase

item.title: konbon
item.description: thoughts fantastic menu highlights scallop carpaccio mazemen (not spicy) corn dessert is so realistic i looked at the table next to us trying to cut theirs in half and thought to myself “who the fuck cuts corn like that”
